com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.processor
Class XLinkProperties

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.processor.XLinkProperties
public class XLinkProperties
extends java.lang.Object

Class that provides properties of XLinkProcessor.
A property consists of the following pair.

  • Property name
  • Property value

Field Detail

PROPERTY_NAME_ID_MODE

public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_NAME_ID_MODE
Property name for ID searching mode.

PROPERTY_NAME_ID_MODE_VALUE_STRICT

public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_NAME_ID_MODE_VALUE_STRICT
Property value for ID searching mode.
This specifies element search using ID attribute.

PROPERTY_NAME_ID_MODE_VALUE_LOOSE

public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_NAME_ID_MODE_VALUE_LOOSE
Property value for ID searching mode.
This specifies element search using "id" attribute, instead of ID attribute.

PROPERTY_NAME_DOMBUILDER

public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_NAME_DOMBUILDER
Property name for DOMBuilder.
Constructor Detail

XLinkProperties

public XLinkProperties()
Constructor.
Method Detail

put

public void put(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.Object value)
This method maps a property value to a property name.
If a property name is null or empty string, and if the property value is null, no process is executed.
Parameters:
name - Property name.
value - Property value.
A default value is set to the property value when an instance incompatible with the class corresponding to the property name is specified.
Classes corresponding to property names are shown below:
  • XLinkProperties.PROPERTY_NAME_ID_MODE : String
  • XLinkProperties.PROPERTY_NAME_DOMBUILDER : DocumentBuilder defined in JAXP1.1
Valid values for property name XLinkProperties.PROPERTY_NAME_ID_MODE are as follows:
  • "loose"
  • "strict"(default)

Default settings for DocumentBuilder are:
  • Coalescing:
    true
  • NamespaceAware:
    true
  • Validating:
    false
  • ExpandEntityReferences:
    true
  • IgnoringComments:
    false
  • IgnoringElementContentWhitespace:
    false

get

public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String name)
This method returns a value mapped to the property name.
Parameters:
name - Property name.
Returns:
A value mapped to the property name.
Null is set when the property name is null or empty string, or no value is mapped to the property name.
